alert.note: Alert for St. Marys (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Warning issued January 30 at 3:05PM EST until January 31 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EST THIS EVENING... ...COASTAL FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 10 PM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Coastal Flood Advisory, up to one half foot of inundation above ground level in low lying areas due to tidal flooding. For the Coastal Flood Warning, up to one foot of inundation above ground level expected in low lying areas due to tidal flooding. * WHERE...Shoreline in St. Marys County. * WHEN...For the Coastal Flood Advisory, until 8 PM EST this evening, especially around the time of high tide. For the Coastal Flood Warning, from 1 AM to 10 PM EST Wednesday, especially around the time of high tide. * IMPACTS...At 3.5 feet, water covers roads on Saint George Island, is in yards, and is approaching structures. To the east, inundation is occurring at multiple marinas off St. Mary`s River, Smith Creek, and Jutland Creek. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Tides two to two and a half feet above normal. The next high tides at Piney Point are 5:28 PM and 5:44 AM. The next high tides at Point Lookout are 4:22 PM and 4:52 AM. The next high tides at Coltons Point are 6:04 PM and 6:20 AM. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. St Marys River at Straits Point MLLW Categories - Minor 3.0 ft, Moderate 3.5 ft, Major 5.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.4 ft, Moderate 1.9 ft, Major 3.4 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 30/05 PM 3.1 1.5 1.9 1.0 Minor 31/05 AM 3.5 1.9 2.3 0.5 Moderate 31/05 PM 3.5 1.9 2.4 0.5 Moderate 01/06 AM 3.4 1.8 2.1 0.5 Minor 01/06 PM 3.0 1.4 1.9 1.0 Minor 02/07 AM 2.9 1.3 1.6 0.5 None &&
info.instruction: Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property. If travel is required, do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth.
